verses.roman:
'ājñā haya, āsi muñi śrī-caraṇa-saṅge
sahite nā pāri muñi viraha-taraṅge'

synonyms: ājñā haya—if there is permission; āsi—may come; muñi—I; śrī-caraṇa-saṅge—with Your Lordship; sahite—to tolerate; nā pāri—not able; muñi—I; viraha-taraṅge—the waves of separation.
translation: "If You give me permission, I shall go with Your Lordship. It is not possible for me to tolerate the waves of separation."
